skill.name: Unlocking the Fugitive
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place a first aid kit.

skill.name: Daredevil
skill.ace: You gain a 15% dodge chance while zip-lining.

skill.name: Hidden Blade
skill.normal: Increases your melee weapon concealment by 2.
skill.ace: Enemies make 95% less noise when shot or meleed to death.

skill.name: Thick Skin
skill.ace: Increases the armor of all ballistic vests by 20.

skill.name: Run and Gun
skill.ace: Your movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.

skill.name: Sixth Sense
skill.normal: When you stand still for 3.5 seconds in stealth, you start highlighting people around you within a 10 meter radius.
skill.ace: You can pickup items while in casing mode.

skill.name: Duck and Cover
skill.normal: You have a 5% better chance dodging enemy fire while crouching.
skill.ace: You have an additional 10% chance dodging enemy fire while crouching.

skill.name: Brother's Keeper
skill.normal: The damage thugs deal to you is reduced by 10%.
skill.ace: The damage thugs deal to you is reduced by an additional 25%.

skill.name: Winston Wolfe
skill.normal: You can now carry 1 additional body bag.
skill.ace: During stealth, you know how to kill without leaving a trace, reducing your cleaning cost by 75%. .

skill.name: Quick Fix
skill.normal: Decreases your first aid kit deploy time by 50%.
skill.ace: Crew members that use your first aid kits take 20% less damage for 10 seconds.

skill.name: Swan Song
skill.normal: When your health reaches 0, instead of instantly going down, you can fight for 3 seconds with a 60% movement speed penalty.
skill.ace: You no longer need to reload and can fight for an additional 6 seconds.

skill.name: Undertaker
skill.normal: You unlock the ability to place the body bag case deployable.
skill.ace: You can now place 2 body bag cases instead of just one.

skill.name: Uppers
skill.normal: Adds 3 more first aid kits to your inventory.
skill.ace: Adds 7 more first aid kits to your inventory.

skill.name: Trigger Happy
skill.normal: Each successful pistol hit grants a 10% damage boost for 2 seconds and can stack 4 times. This does not apply to Akimbo Weapons.
skill.ace: Increases the damage boost duration to 8. Akimbo remains unaffected.

skill.name: Low Blow
skill.normal: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to 30%.
skill.ace: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to 30%.

skill.name: Counter Striker
skill.normal: When charging your melee weapon you will counterattack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. The knockdown does not deal any damage.

skill.name: Bullseye
skill.normal: You regenerate 15 armor for each successful headshot. This can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.
skill.ace: You regenerate an additional 30 armor for each successful headshot.

skill.name: Sneaky Bastard
skill.normal: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to 10%.
skill.ace: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to 10%.

skill.name: Akimbo
skill.normal: You can dual wield two weapons. These can be found under the Akimbo tab in the inventory menu. Dual wielded weapons have 50% stability penalty.
skill.ace: Your stability penalty with Akimbo weapons is set to 25% and increases the ammo capacity of your Akimbo weapons to 150%.
